body: I know that this is the second ama ive created in a really short span of time but im stuck in china for two weeks with no friends and people to talk to and im legit bored af. I created this thread because i want to know what people think about me so please just leave down ur opinions on me and what u think about me, the more the better. Thankyou.

title: Chertan's not really an AMA
